document_data.caption: A map showing Mirror Lake northwest of Chrysalis.
document_data.name: Mirror Lake
document_data.mainbody: '''Mirror Lake''' was a small body of freshwater located within the [[elf|elven]] kingdom of [[Synnoria]] on the isle of [[Gwynneth]] on the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Geography: The lake was situated {{SI|3|mi|k|long=yes}} directly northwest of the small island upon which the elven city of [[Chrysalis]] sat. It was fed by several small unnamed rivers descending from the surrounding [[Cambro Mountains]] and [[the Highlands]].
document_data.Description: Mirror Lake was relatively small, covering only {{SI|2|sq mi|k|long=yes}} of area.
